meanings.definition: The arrangement of lights to achieve a particular effect.
meanings.sent1: The stage lighting highlighted the actors' faces.
meanings.sent2: The room's lighting was too dim for reading comfortably.
meanings.sent3: The party lighting made the dance floor look like a disco.
meanings.sent4: The soft lighting in the restaurant created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The colorful lighting at the concert mesmerized the audience.

meanings.definition: The equipment used to provide light in a room or building.
meanings.sent1: The new lighting fixtures brightened up the office space.
meanings.sent2: The street lighting helped pedestrians navigate safely at night.
meanings.sent3: The fancy lighting in the store made the products shine.
meanings.sent4: The emergency lighting in the building guided people to exits.
meanings.sent5: The outdoor lighting illuminated the garden beautifully.

meanings.sent1: The matchstick was used for the lighting of the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The faulty wiring caused a fire due to improper lighting.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved the lighting of a candle with magic.
meanings.sent4: The quick lighting of the fuse set off the fireworks display.
meanings.sent5: The lighting of the stove signaled the start of cooking dinner.
